text:
BUmi# rBUqmnA dyau rva#riqNA&ntari#kShaM mahiqtvA |
uqpasthE# tE dEvyaditEq &gnima#nnAqdamaqnnAdyAqyA &&da#dhE ||
A&yaM gauH pRuSni#rakramIqdasa#nan mAqtaraqM puna#H |
piqtara#M ca praqyanth^^suva#H ||
triq(gm)qSaddhAmaq vi rA#jatiq vAk pa#taqgAMya# SiSriyE | pratya#sya vahaq dyuBi#H || 
aqsya prAqNAda#pAnaqtya#ntaSca#rati rOcaqnA | vya#Kyan mahiqShaH suva#H ||
yattvA$- [  ] 10
